message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand that you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I can meet you halfway, though. How about we settle on $110? I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I understand that $95 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. How about we meet at $105? I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value you're offering.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $98. I'm willing to make one more concession, though. How about we meet at $108? I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

I understand that you're trying to get the best price for your product, Alice, but I'm really struggling to justify paying $108. I'm willing to pay $102 for the product. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
